description:
This course is all about learning specific technique to improve the way you sound.  The specific training in this course is geared toward the exact techniques that will make you sound more confident.  There are many voice elements, but in this course you'll learn the very specialized techniques that will make you sound more confident.  

The course covers why you don't sound confident and the history of the psychology of your voice.  The course also covers the exact steps necessary to lay a new top layer of a more confident sounding voice into the muscle memory.  The course teaches the exact techniques with step by step instruction in the areas of pace, pausing, volume, breathing, getting the words out and posture, all crucial to sounding more confident.  This course covers the exact techniques and includes the application and practice strategy necessary for sounding more confident when you are finished.
title: Speak with a Confident Voice and Catapult Your Success
